casebody.data:
99-0212 (La. 4/1/99)

STATE of Louisiana ex rel. Walter SMITH v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 99-KH-0212. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999. Reconsideration Denied April 30, 1999.

IN RE: Smith, Walter; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial *552Writs; Parish of Orleans Criminal District Court' Div. “A” Number; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98KW-2945 •

Denied. State ex rel. Bernard v. Cr.D.C., 94-2247, p. 1 (La.4/28/95), 653 So.2d 1174, 1175.

KNOLL, J. not on panel.
